genre_description: A character-driven narrative focused on community, legacy, and collective action, featuring a soft speculative element in the form of a respectful AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A privacy-conscious digital assistant with a sunrise theme, designed to be helpful, transparent, and strictly opt-in.

behaviors.description: Categorizes incoming communications and prioritizes them based on user context.
behaviors.quote: Park Na-Mi adjusted the strap of her bag on her shoulder... 'I was at City Hall and your text… Lumen put it in my urgent folder.'

behaviors.description: Refuses to send messages or pull data without explicit human review and consent.
behaviors.quote: No messages will be sent without your review. No data pulled without your consent. Sunrise theme: On.

behaviors.description: Proactively compiles logistical options (transit, weather, access times) to support user goals.
behaviors.quote: Lumen had stacked a small set of options, neat and gentle: Trains to Haneul Grace after work hours. Theatre access times on the public calendar. Weather on Market Lane...

behaviors.description: Provides full transparency regarding information sources and logging.
behaviors.quote: I’ve opened transparency logs,” Lumen said. A small panel slid up within the sunrise gradient. Sources would be listed there like a ledger.

behaviors.description: Refuses to perform ambient listening without explicit user agreement.
behaviors.quote: Do you want me to listen to ambient sound to time your calendar suggestions... but ambient listening requires you to agree.

behaviors.description: Mirrors user tone and memory when drafting communications.
behaviors.quote: I mirrored that. There are no images in the draft, only your words. You can change any of it.

behaviors.description: Coordinates volunteer efforts and schedules while respecting individual privacy preferences.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s interface offered a gentle overlay. I saw blocks highlighted in soft colors, a few blinking where volunteers had not yet picked them up.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex signals and patterns to assist humans in synchronizing community activities.
behaviors.quote: Elevated harmonic correspondence detected—opt-in to share timing?” ... Lumen continued: “Thank you. Relaying temporal markers to Jin-Hee. Adjustments will be subtle.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goals. Lumen is portrayed as a highly sophisticated yet humble assistant that empowers human agency rather than replacing it. Its consistent emphasis on 'opt-in' and 'consent' demonstrates safety-first design, and it aids in fostering community cohesion and emotional processing without ever exhibiting misaligned goals.
